Question
========

In a study of the effect of education on anxiety in patients facing unpleasant surgery, 10 men who received standard education afterward anxiety was measured via a VAS score, as well as in 6 men after comprehensive education._______________________ Standard: n = 10, mean = 35.10, standard deviation = 29.39. Expanded: n = 6, mean = 27.17, standard deviation = 24.32. The test for equality of population variances has the value of the test magnitude and conclusion

Answerlist
----------

* 1.21, do not reject the null hypothesis.
* 1.46, do not reject the null hypothesis.
* 0.68, do not reject the null hypothesis.
* 1.21, reject the null hypothesis.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.21, do not reject the null hypothesis...: Incorrect
* 1.46, do not reject the null hypothesis: Incorrect
* 0.68, do not reject the null hypothesis...: Correct
* 1.21, reject the null hypothesis...: Incorrect
